actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of April 9, 1966, so as to provide for the acquisition of Oxon Hill Manor for use as the official residence for the Vice President of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of General Services to acquire Oxon Hill Manor, Maryland, for use as the official residence for the Vice President of the United States. Authorizes $1,500,000 for purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of April 9, 1966, so as to provide for the acquisition of Oxon Hill Manor for use as the official residence for the Vice President of the United States.
